title: The Lost and Found
content:
** Note** The "+2 Potion of Boost" will work with Minefighter and Blacksmithing as the material for Blacksmithing is available from level 56, lowering their requirements to level 59 Minefighter, 7 Knowledge and level 58 Blacksmithing, 6 Knowledge. This does not work for Stonemason and Bonewright, as their resource items are NOT available in the shop prematurely, though it can still lower the required Knowledge.

Only 0.01 units of the items are required for the Podiums.

Must be completed in order:

Dice - 40 Bonewright (5 passive knowledge)

Shinerium Jewelry - 60 Blacksmith (8 passive knowledge)

Grey Marble Vases - 46 Stonemason (6 passive knowledge)

https://gyazo.com/d3b7ba656260d7546538b4313d962323

Shaggy Beastman - 61 Minefighter (9 passive knowledge)

https://gyazo.com/09a211c3c7c0b8e3181f1377e35e1827

https://gyazo.com/14ea3be6a943d958f4d57e49fb794b47

https://gyazo.com/ccf739e8a24356adea6e6cbcdd66515b
